text: Rudnik pri Radomljah () is a dispersed settlement of isolated small farms on the hills above Volčji Potok in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Rudnik to Rudnik pri Radomljah in 1955.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==References== ==External links== *Rudnik pri Radomljah at Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Rudnik pri Radomljah
